meanings.definition: The square space between triglyphs in a Doric frieze.
meanings.sent1: The metopes were beautifully carved with intricate designs.
meanings.sent2: The architect carefully planned the placement of the metopes in the frieze.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide its acorns in the metopes of the building.
meanings.sent4: The metopes stood out like ancient storytellers frozen in time.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight cast dramatic shadows on the metopes, creating a mesmerizing effect.

meanings.definition: A decorative element in classical architecture.
meanings.sent1: The metopes added elegance to the otherwise plain structure.
meanings.sent2: Visitors admired the intricate details of the classical metopes.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended the metopes were secret doors to a magical world.
meanings.sent4: The metopes seemed to whisper tales of the past to those who gazed upon them.
meanings.sent5: The colorful flowers blooming near the metopes enhanced their beauty even more.

meanings.definition: A panel in a frieze with relief sculpture.
meanings.sent1: The artist skillfully crafted the metopes to depict scenes from mythology.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed ancient metopes from different historical periods.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to climb the metopes, thinking they were real animals.
meanings.sent4: The metopes seemed to come alive, telling stories through their intricate carvings.
meanings.sent5: The rainwater cascaded down the metopes, highlighting every detail of the relief sculptures.
